Container.Name: plex-meta-manager

Branch.TagDescription: Latest commits from the develop branch
Latest commits from the nightly branch

Container.Overview: Plex-meta-manager(https://github.com/meisnate12/Plex-Meta-Manager) is a Python 3 script that can be continuously run using YAML configuration files to update on a schedule the metadata of the movies, shows, and collections in your libraries as well as automatically build collections based on various methods all detailed in the wiki.
Container.Changes:
### 2023-12-23 - Rebase to Alpine 3.19.
### 2023-06-10 - Rebase to Alpine 3.18, deprecate armhf.
### 2023-03-05 - Add nightly branch.
### 2022-12-11 - Rebase master to Alpine 3.17.
### 2022-11-08 - Add develop branch.
### 2022-10-25 - Support commandline args and relative paths.
### 2022-10-03 - Rebase to Alpine 3.16, migrate to s6v3.
### 2022-01-30 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: PMM_CONFIG
Config.Description: Specify a custom config file to use.

Config.Name: PMM_TIME
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of times to update each day. Format: `HH:MM`.

Config.Name: PMM_RUN
Config.Description: Set to `True` to run without the scheduler.

Config.Name: PMM_TEST
Config.Description: Set to `True` to run in debug mode with only collections that have `test: true`.

Config.Name: PMM_NO_MISSING
Config.Description: Set to `True` to run without any of the missing movie/show functions.
